name: First Person Shooter Test (beta)
description:
An unity game with code that was written with help 
First person shooter with weapons and targets 
version 0.5 
in the near future i will release a 0.7 version which is in the making as of now
i tought i should release this beta so yall could see what i was working on 
Tutorial:

W A S D / arrow keys to move

space to jump

click to shoot 

r to reload

change weapon with scroll wheel or numbers (1,2,3,4,5,6,7 and 8)

How to download?

download the zip file and extract 

run the exe and enjoy :D

(alt + f4 to close sadly i cant implement an exit button :(  

Weapons:

1: pistol 

2: automatic rile 

3:shotgun

4:grenade launcher

5:rocket launcher

6:heat laser

7:exploding laser rifle

8:homing missile launcher 

Enjoy :D
